definition: (haven't done sth) for a long time/a long time since we last met

sentences.english: I stand in front of the calendar disappointed for a long time and a sense of desolation over my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我站在挂历前怅然了很久，一种苍凉的感觉漫过心头。
然而，宁静并未持续很久。

sentences.english: The soldiers thought that it would be a long time before civil government would be re-established.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们认为要在很久以后才能重建平民政府。

sentences.english: It seemed that they walked down that hill-slope for a long way, but perhaps it was a short way;
sentences.chinese: 他们似乎在山坡上走了很久，但也许只有一会儿。

sentences.english: The longer you stay here, the more you will like the place.
sentences.chinese: 你在这里待得愈久，你愈会喜爱那个地方。

sentences.english: In the game's history, the Japanese monopolizing the world for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 在游戏的历史中，日本独霸了整个世界很久。

sentences.english: There are reports of microbes surviving for much longer in a kind of suspended animation.
sentences.chinese: 还有报道称有的微生物在某种假死状态下活得更久。

sentences.english: Buy things that are more expensive, but last longer.
sentences.chinese: 买更贵，但能用得更久的东西。

sentences.english: This is especially important if you have a sedentary job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的工作性质是久坐不起类，那这一点特别重要。

sentences.english: But it reminded me of something that I had long forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 但是它让我想起了一些我已经忘记了很久的事情。

sentences.english: One of the lingering challenges in cognitive psychology is the evolution of language.
sentences.chinese: 认知心理学久而未决的挑战之一便是语言的进化。

sentences.english: Would the rest of the students really be willing to sit for that long waiting to eat?
sentences.chinese: 其他学生会在那里空等那么久才吃得上晚饭么？

sentences.english: It's just that as Methuselah,I live a very,very,very long time.
sentences.chinese: 就和玛士萨拉一样，我活了非常非常久。

sentences.english: "Oh well, I expect it'll last our time, " said Jim.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆说“哦，好吧，我希望它能活得比我们久。”

sentences.english: In addition, this is what perplex me a lot.
sentences.chinese: 而且，这也是困扰了我很久的问题。

definition: a while/a spell/a short time/a burst
time/auspicious time/time and date/long period of time/this day
a few years/several years/how many years
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
